original_text: The third angel poured out his bowl on the rivers and springs of water, and they became blood.
korean_text: 셋째 천사가 그 대접을 강과 물 근원에 쏟으매 피가 되더라

sentences.original_text: The third angel poured out his bowl
sentences.korean_translation: 세 번째 천사가 자기 대접을 쏟았다

sentences.original_text: on the rivers and springs of water
